data.actual_result: Badge toast lasts 2 seconds on the profile, and 1.7 seconds outside of the profile.
data.expected_result: Badge description toast lasts same on both screens.
data.short_description: Badge description toast lasts shorter when the toast appears outside of the profile.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user that has a lot of badges. - Go to their profile, and click on their badges left to right in a fast pace. - First, count how many seconds the badge description toast lasts in the profile. Then, repeat the left to right, and close out the profile right away. - Badge description roast should pop up outside of the mini profile. Count how long it lasts (recording and checking the exact time helps.
